title: WHEN WILL KAYN BE ON SALE?!?!?
body: Kayn is the new champion and _still_ hasnt been on sale!!!

replies.body:
Explain how putting new things on sale makes sense.

(Wait, people actually buy champs with RP?)
To sell to people who wouldn't otherwise buy it at full price
as a matter of fact people do buy champs with RP.. better than buying a skin with RP
But why not just spend IP, which is free.....unless you're rich or don't care about spending loads of money on league, it just makes more sense to me.
new champs do not go on sale for a while :^)
